Declarations declared (possibly via multiple hops) by the given theory/document/archive
Declarations induced via (possibly multiple concatenated) explicit theory morphisms (aka. views)
Declarations induced via any (possibly multiple concatenated) theory morphisms (views, includes, metas andimplicit morphisms)
Declarations aligned (possibly via multiple intermediate alignments) with declaration declared by the giventheory/document/archive
maltyped (type can't be infered) constant declaration
constructors returning kinds or object in even higher typing universes
the transitive closure of all theory morphisms into the theory
the transitive closure of all theory morphisms into the theory
